about_the_game:
Kittens are having a great time in the playground. 

You can find kitties in places such as swings, slides, a trampoline, or a bouncy castle.

Hidden Cats Playground  is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find all kitties hiden on the map.

"Hidden Cats : Playground" is decorated with atmospheric and hand-drawn graphics, the cats are cozy and cute.

A total of 200 creatures to find.

hand-drawn graphics

progress record

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: 100 hidden Cats : Playground

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Graphics: iGPU / GT 710
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
